sections.purpose: To reduce particle size of crude drugs and dried plant materials by impact and attrition.
sections.scope: Applicable to coarse and fine grinding in Pharmacognosy sample preparation.
procedure: Inspect the mill, grinding jar, and balls for cleanliness and integrity.
Weigh and load the required quantity of dried material and grinding media into the jar.
Securely close the jar lid and mount it on the mill.
Set the rotation speed and grinding time as per the protocol.
Start the mill and monitor for abnormal noise or vibration.
After completion, stop the mill, allow the jar to come to rest, and open carefully.
Collect the ground material, sieve if required, and clean the jar and balls.
precautions: Do not exceed recommended fill volume for the jar.
Ensure lid is tightly closed to prevent leakage of fine powder.
Use appropriate PPE (mask, goggles) when handling powders.
Do not open the jar or touch moving parts while the mill is running.
Avoid milling heat-sensitive materials for prolonged periods without cooling intervals.
